rings.name: ADOPT
rings.description: Technologies we have high confidence in to serve our purpose, also in large scale.

rings.name: TRIAL
rings.description: Technologies that we see potential in and are worth pursuing.

rings.name: ASSESS
rings.description: Technologies that are promising and have clear potential value.

rings.name: HOLD
rings.description: Technologies not recommended to be used for new projects.
